original_text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks, they cast four anchors out of the stern, and wished for the day.
korean_text: 암초에 걸릴까 하여 고물로 닻 넷을 내리고 날이 새기를 고대하니라

sentences.original_text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks
they cast four anchors out of the stern
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 선미에서 닻 네 개를 던졌고
